commit.message:
Auto merge of #53887 - flip1995:tool_lints, r=Manishearth

Fix of bug introduced by #53762 (tool_lints)

Before implementing backwards compat for tool lints, the `Tool` case when parsing cmdline lints was unreachable. This changed with #53762.

This fix is needed for rls test-pass. (@nrc)

r? @Manishearth

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,23 @@

+// except according to those terms.
+
+// run-pass
+// aux-build:lint_tool_test.rs
+// ignore-stage1
+// compile-flags: -A test-lint
+
+#![feature(plugin)]
+#![warn(unused)]
+#![plugin(lint_tool_test)]
+
+fn lintme() { }
+
+pub fn main() {
+}

@@ -0,0 +1,25 @@
+warning: lint name `test_lint` is deprecated and does not have an effect anymore. Use: clippy::test_lint
+   |
+   = note: requested on the command line with `-A test_lint`
+
+warning: item is named 'lintme'
+  --> $DIR/lint_tool_cmdline_allow.rs:20:1
+   |
+LL | fn lintme() { }
+   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
+   |
+   = note: #[warn(clippy::test_lint)] on by default
+
+warning: function is never used: `lintme`
+  --> $DIR/lint_tool_cmdline_allow.rs:20:1
+   |
+LL | fn lintme() { }
+   | ^^^^^^^^^^^
+   |
+note: lint level defined here
+  --> $DIR/lint_tool_cmdline_allow.rs:17:9
+   |
+LL | #![warn(unused)]
+   |         ^^^^^^
+   = note: #[warn(dead_code)] implied by #[warn(unused)]
+
